abstract: Moving to address concerns from regulators that the bank’s board lacks financial acumen, Bank of America plans to announce later Friday that its board has elected four new directors.
snippet: Moving to address concerns from regulators that the bank’s board lacks financial acumen, Bank of America plans to announce later Friday that its board has elected four new directors.
lead_paragraph: Update | 4:04 p.m. From Louise Story, a DealBook colleague:

headline.main: Bank of America Names 4 New Directors
